MISSING_AMOUNT: You must specify the number of bonus invites you want to remove. (Syntax: {{prefix}}removebonus number @member/all)
INVALID_AMOUNT: You must specify a __**valid**__ number of bonus invites that you want to remove. (Syntax: {{prefix}}removebonus number @member/all)

CONFIRMATION_ALL: :warning: Are you sure you want to remove **{{count}}** bonus invites to everyone? This operation can take a long time (depending on the size of your server)! Send `-confirm` to continue and `cancel` to cancel.
SUCCESS_CONTENT_MEMBER: Send `{{prefix}}invites {{usertag}}` to see the new number of invites of **{{username}}**!
